starvationevasion.io.XMLparsers

Class RegionParserHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • starvationevasion.io.XMLparsers.RegionParserHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KMLParser

    public class RegionParserHandler
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
    The class handles the parsing of the region data from XML into region objects.

    • Method Detail

      • getRegionList

        public java.util.List<GeographicArea> getRegionList()
        The method is to be called AFTER this class has been used in parsing. Other wise this returns null. So check for null exceptions!
        Returns:
        list of regions from the last file parsed.

      • getLocator

        public org.xml.sax.Locator getLocator()
        This is used to extract the line number from a parsing error
        Returns:
        Locator representing a location in file.
